assessment_item.title: ಭಾರತ ಒಕ್ಕೂಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆಗೊಳ್ಳದೆ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರವಾಗಿ ಉಳಿಯಲು ಇಚ್ಛಿಸಿದ ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರದ ದೊರೆ
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಭಾರತ ಒಕ್ಕೂಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆಗೊಳ್ಳದೆ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರವಾಗಿ ಉಳಿಯಲು ಇಚ್ಛಿಸಿದ ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರದ ದೊರೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಹರಿಸಿಂಗ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4996"},{"text":"

ಷೇಕ್ ಅಬ್ದುಲ್ಲ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4997"},{"text":"

ರಜಾಕ್ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5007"},{"text":"

ರಣಜಿತ್ ಸಿಂಗ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5012"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಭಾರತ ಒಕ್ಕೂಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆಗೊಳ್ಳದೆ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರವಾಗಿ ಉಳಿಯಲು ಇಚ್ಛಿಸಿದ ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರದ ದೊರೆ ","title":"ಭಾರತ ಒಕ್ಕೂಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆಗೊಳ್ಳದೆ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರವಾಗಿ ಉಳಿಯಲು ಇಚ್ಛಿಸಿದ ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರದ ದೊರೆ ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
